attributes.action: ask channel four to bring back whos line is it anyway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is not enough light entertainment/comedy to counter the current misery of the country so ask channel four to reintroduce some of its old comedy which were such a success such as who's line is it anyway etc

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
